unnormalised: **Auto Buzz: New Wheels Hit the Indian Roads!**
normalised: **Auto Buzz: New Wheels Hit the Indian Roads!**

unnormalised: Hey gearheads! The automotive scene is buzzing with launches hotter than a Delhi summer!
normalised: Hey gearheads! The automotive scene is buzzing with launches hotter than a Delhi summer!

unnormalised: First up, Mahindra rolled out a limited edition Thar near Jodhpur, decked out with some seriously cool desert-themed accessories. Expect to see these babies climbing dunes soon!
normalised: First up, Mahindra rolled out a limited edition Thar near Jodhpur, decked out with some seriously cool desert-themed accessories. Expect to see these babies climbing dunes soon!

unnormalised: Then, Tata Motors unveiled a new variant of the Nexon, the ‘Kesar Edition’ – named after the vibrant saffron spice. Sources say its priced competitively, around Rs. 9 lakhs.
normalised: Then, Tata Motors unveiled a new variant of the Nexon, the ‘Kesar Edition’ – named after the vibrant saffron spice. Sources say its priced competitively, around rupee nine lakhs.

unnormalised: Not to be left behind, Maruti Suzuki launched the next-gen Alto 800, promising better fuel efficiency. Dr. Sharma from ARAI was present, praising its improvements.
normalised: Not to be left behind, Maruti Suzuki launched the next-gen Alto eight hundred, promising better fuel efficiency. Doctor Sharma from A R A I was present, praising its improvements.

unnormalised: Ola Electric also announced the opening of their new 'Futurefactory' expansion in Tamil Nadu, adding a whopping 100,000 sq ft to their manufacturing capacity. They're aiming for 2 million scooters per year! That’s a lot of electric power hitting the streets!
normalised: Ola Electric also announced the opening of their new 'Futurefactory' expansion in Tamil Nadu, adding a whopping one hundred thousand square feet to their manufacturing capacity. They're aiming for two million scooters per year! That’s a lot of electric power hitting the streets!

unnormalised: Finally, Ashok Leyland launched a new line of commercial vehicles, focusing on enhanced safety and reduced emissions – crucial for our bustling Indian cities. Keep your eyes peeled on the roads, folks! Lots of new metal to admire!
normalised: Finally, Ashok Leyland launched a new line of commercial vehicles, focusing on enhanced safety and reduced emissions – crucial for our bustling Indian cities. Keep your eyes peeled on the roads, folks! Lots of new metal to admire!
